definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
flash of lightning, morning dew (idiom); fig. ephemeral/impermanent

sentences.english: Can they feel the  crackle of  electricity in the wind?
sentences.chinese: 他們能否感受到風中的電光火石？

sentences.english: And the living creatures ran and returned as the appearance of a flash of lightning.
sentences.chinese: 這活物往來奔走，好像電光一閃。

sentences.english: For the energy crisis, energy-efficient electric light was needed urgently.
sentences.chinese: 隨着能源緊張，需要更節能的電光源。

sentences.english: LEDs are point lighting sources; they shine in only one direction.
sentences.chinese: LED是電光源，它們只能照亮一個方向。

sentences.english: E. Inspect cornea for opacities by shining light at an angle toward the corner a.
sentences.chinese: 用手電光斜照角膜，檢查角膜濁斑。

sentences.english: Electro - optic ( EO ) materials are a new class of information materials based on photonics.
sentences.chinese: 電光材料是以光子爲載體的新一代信息材料。

sentences.english: High voltage sodium lamp is the leading source of roadway illumination.
sentences.chinese: 高壓鈉燈是城鎮道路照明的主要電光源之一。

sentences.english: It poured and it lightninged. It thundered! It rumbled.
sentences.chinese: 大雨如注，電光閃閃，雷聲隆隆。

sentences.english: Microwave sulfur lamp (MSL) is a kind of effective electrodeless electrical light source.
sentences.chinese: 微波硫燈是一種高效節能的無電極電光源。

sentences.english: A flash of lightning is electricity jumping.
The fierce lightning is scratching the sky with its nails.
sentences.chinese: 兇猛的電光用它的爪子抓着天空。

sentences.english: A flash of lightning hit the tree.
Can they feel the crackle of electricity in the wind?
sentences.chinese: 他們能否感遭到風外的電光火石？

sentences.english: He loads the clouds with moisture; he scatters his lightning through them.
sentences.chinese: 他使密雲盛滿水氣，佈散電光之雲。

sentences.english: The effects on the extinction ratio of double crystal electro-optic Q-switching were analyzed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 分析了影響雙塊晶體電光調Q消光比的各項因素。

sentences.english: Then came lighting and roll of thunder.
sentences.chinese: 接着是電光閃閃，雷聲隆隆。

definition: the sky/the firmament/the vault of heaven
Kaiyuan county level city in Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture, Yunnan
talking in one's sleep/delirious ravings/nonsense/sheer fantasy
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
